MaUeson wires 2nd August repeating Constantinople and Tehran :-" According to reports from Askabad conditions there are chaotic. Troops clamouring for payment, numbers deserting, some rioting and much looting, ft is believed in Askabad that Japanese have appeared on Semirechia and Orenburg fronts. There is no talk of advance to Krasnovodsk. The moral of the Bolshevik troops is very low and condition of troops deplorable."
